1209038176066646016.full_text:
Igual que me pasa con  @AuschwitzMuseum, ver los rostros de los sobrevivientes/victimas de genocidio, me  toca profundamente, no son solo cifras, sino que se trata del relato del dolor sufrido por millones de seres humanos, nuestros hermanos.

#NanjingMassacre Japon contra China.

1205977271242313729.full_text:
Yesterday commemorates the 82nd anniversary of the #NanjingMassacre.

Despite efforts from some who attempt to bury or minimize the atrocities, I owe it to my kids (whose mum is from Nanjing) to remember and honour the victims like I do my own family killed in the Holocaust. 🕯️

1210939205561528326.full_text: @jwomack Gorgeous. This would be around the same time that she was discovering her roots and starting to campaign to defend China from Japanese fascism. Japan had taken Nanjing at the end of 1937. #nanjingmassacre
